page.title: 06Sheepskin W/house_Leck area
page.content: The biggest employer of people in our block is the Sheepskin Warehouse.The Sheepskin Warehouse gets in wool from New Zealand and Australia and they make the wool into jumpers, coats, slippers, gloves, hats, toys, novelties, etc.They get some jumpers from Guernsey and Shetland.They have got several shops all over England. They supply other shops in the Lake District and Scotland.One of the shops they supply is the Edinburgh Woollen Mill.Their warehouse and offices are in our area.The Sheepskin Warehouse is owned by Mark Birrbeck and it is sometimes called Mark Birkbeck & Co. They make fun things such as teddy bears, little lambs, sheep, feather dusters, little hairy animals and the most crazy thing they make is a Sheepskin belly-button warmer.
